name: Arcane Conundrum
description: Hex Spell. For 5...13...15 seconds, spells cast by target foe and all adjacent foes take twice as long to cast. When this hex ends, you gain 1...6...7 energy. [sic]

name: Arcane Echo
description: Enchantment Spell. If you cast a spell in the next 20 seconds, Arcane Echo is replaced with that spell for 20 seconds. Arcane Echo ends prematurely if you use a non-spell skill.

name: Arcane Mimicry
description: Spell. For 20 seconds, Arcane Mimicry becomes the non-form elite skill from target other ally.

name: Backfire
description: Hex Spell. For 10 seconds, whenever target foe casts a spell, that foe takes 35...119...140 damage.

name: Clumsiness
description: Hex Spell. For 4 seconds, target and adjacent foes are hexed with Clumsiness. The next time each foe attacks, the attack is interrupted and that foe suffers 10...76...92 damage.

name: Conjure Phantasm
description: Hex Spell.  For 2...13...16 seconds, target foe experiences -5 Health degeneration.

name: Crippling Anguish
description: Elite Hex Spell. For 5...17...20 seconds, target moves and attacks 50% slower and suffers -1...7...8 Health degeneration.

name: Crippling Anguish (PvP)
description: Elite Hex Spell. For 5...17...20 seconds, target moves 50% slower and suffers -1...4...5 Health degeneration.

name: Cry of Frustration
description: Spell. If target foe is using a skill, that foe and all foes in the area are interrupted and suffer 15...63...75 damage.

name: Diversion
description: Hex Spell. For 6 seconds, the next time target foe uses a skill, that skill takes an additional 10...47...56 seconds to recharge.

name: Drain Enchantment
description: Spell. Remove an enchantment from target foe. If an enchantment is removed, you gain 8...15...17 Energy and 40...104...120 Health.

name: Echo
description: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 30 seconds, Echo is replaced with the next skill you use. Echo acts as this skill for 30 seconds.

name: Empathy
description: Hex Spell. For 5...13...15 seconds, whenever target foe attacks, that foe takes 10...46...55 damage and deals 1...12...15 less damage.

name: Empathy (PvP)
description: Hex Spell. For 5...13...15 seconds, whenever target foe attacks, that foe takes 15...39...45 damage.

name: Energy Burn
description: Spell. Target foe loses 1...8...10 Energy and takes 9 damage for each point of Energy lost.

name: Energy Drain
description: Elite Spell. Target foe loses 2...8...9 Energy. You gain 3 Energy for each point of Energy lost.

name: Energy Surge
description: Elite Spell. Target foe loses 1...8...10 Energy. For each point of Energy lost, that foe and all nearby foes take 9 damage.

name: Energy Tap
description: Spell. Target foe loses 4...6...7 Energy. You gain 2 Energy for each point of Energy lost.

name: Epidemic
description: Spell. Spread all negative conditions and their remaining durations from target foe to all foes adjacent to your target.

name: Ether Feast
description: Spell. Target foe loses 3 Energy. You are healed 20...56...65 for each point of Energy lost.

name: Fragility
description: Hex Spell. For 8...18...20 seconds, target and adjacent foes take 5...17...20 damage each time they suffer or recover from a new condition.

name: Fragility (PvP)
description: Hex Spell. For 8...18...20 seconds, target foe takes 5...17...20 damage each time that foe suffers or recovers from a new condition.

name: Hex Breaker
description: Stance. For 5...65...80 seconds, the next time you are the target of a hex, that hex fails and the caster takes 10...39...46 damage.

name: Ignorance
description: Hex Spell. For 8...18...20 seconds target foe cannot use signets.

name: Illusion of Haste
description: Enchantment Spell. For 5...10...11 seconds you are no longer Crippled, and you move 33% faster. When Illusion of Haste ends, you become Crippled for 3 seconds.

name: Illusion of Haste (PvP)
description: Enchantment Spell. For 5...10...11 seconds, you move 33% faster. When Illusion of Haste ends, you become Crippled for 3 seconds.

name: Imagined Burden
description: Hex Spell. For 8...18...20 seconds, target foe moves 50% slower.

name: Leech Signet
description: Signet. Interrupt target foe's action. If that action was a spell, you gain 3...13...15 Energy.

name: Mantra of Earth
description: Stance. For 30...78...90 seconds, whenever you take earth damage, the damage is reduced by 26...45...50% and you gain 2 Energy.

name: Mantra of Flame
description: Stance. For 30...78...90 seconds, whenever you take fire damage, the damage is reduced by 26...45...50% and you gain 2 Energy.

name: Mantra of Frost
description: Stance. For 30...78...90 seconds, whenever you take cold damage, the damage is reduced by 26...45...50% and you gain 2 Energy.

name: Mantra of Inscriptions
description: Stance. For 5...21...25 seconds, signets you successfully activate while in this stance recharge 10...34...40% faster.

name: Mantra of Lightning
description: Stance. For 30...78...90 seconds, whenever you take lightning damage, the damage is reduced by 26...45...50% and you gain 2 Energy.

name: Mantra of Persistence
description: Stance. For 5...21...25 seconds, any Illusion Magic hex you cast lasts 10...34...40% longer.

name: Mantra of Recovery
description: Elite Stance. For 5...17...20 seconds, spells you cast recharge 33% faster.

name: Mantra of Resolve
description: Stance. For 30...78...90 seconds, you cannot be interrupted, but each time you would have been interrupted, you lose 10...5...4 Energy or Mantra of Resolve ends.

name: Mantra of Resolve (PvP)
description: Stance. For 5 seconds, you cannot be interrupted, but each time you would have been interrupted, you lose 10...5...4 Energy or Mantra of Resolve ends.

name: Mind Wrack
description: Hex Spell. For 5...33...40 seconds, whenever this foe is the target of any of your non-hex Mesmer skills, that foe loses 1 Energy and takes 5...21...25 damage per point of Energy lost. If the target foe's Energy drops to 0, Mind Wrack ends and that foe takes 15...83...100 damage.

name: Mind Wrack (PvP)
description: Hex Spell. For 5...33...40 seconds, whenever this foe is the target of one of your non-hex Mesmer skills, that foe loses 1 Energy. If the target foe's Energy drops to 0, Mind Wrack ends and that foe takes 15...83...100 damage.

name: Power Drain
description: Spell. If target foe is casting a spell or chant, that skill is interrupted and you gain 1...25...31 Energy.

name: Power Spike
description: Spell. If target foe is casting a spell or a chant, that skill is interrupted and target foe takes 30...102...120 damage.

name: Shatter Enchantment
description: Spell. Remove an enchantment from target foe. If an enchantment is removed, that foe takes 14...83...100 damage.

name: Shatter Hex
description: Spell. Remove a hex from target ally. If a hex is removed, foes near that ally take 30...102...120 damage.

name: Signet of Humility
description: Signet. Target foe's elite skill is disabled for 1...13...16 second[s]. Your non-Mesmer skills are disabled for 10 seconds.

name: Soothing Images
description: Hex Spell. For 8...18...20 seconds, target foe and all adjacent foes cannot gain adrenaline.

name: Spirit Shackles
description: Hex Spell. For 5...17...20 seconds, target foe loses 5 Energy whenever that foe attacks.

name: Time Ward
description: Elite Ward Spell. You create a Time Ward at your location. For (3...13...15) seconds, non-spirit allies in this area cast spells (15...19...20)% faster and recharge skills (15...19...20)% faster. PvE Skill
